summary: This is an FBI intake document recording a report from a victim who alleges she was raped by Jeffrey Epstein in 2001 or 2002 in New York. The victim describes being approached by an unknown male (believed to be Epstein) in an apartment building lobby, being threatened and assaulted in an apartment, and later being potentially drugged by a man named Victor Lee.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual accused by the victim of raping her in 2001 or 2002 in New York, NY. The victim describes being threatened and assaulted by him.

persons.name: Victor Lee
persons.context: A man who organized a conference the victim attended. The victim believes he drugged her with a drink the night after the alleged assault, claiming to be an herbal doctor.

connections.description: Both are mentioned by the victim in the context of sequential nights during the same trip; Epstein as the alleged rapist and Lee as the man who allegedly drugged her the following night.

events.title: Alleged Rape by Epstein
events.description: The victim reports being raped by Jeffrey Epstein in an apartment on the Upper East Side of New York, NY. She describes being threatened, forced to remove her shirt, and sexually assaulted.

events.title: Potential Drugging by Victor Lee
events.description: The night after the alleged rape, the victim believes she was drugged by Victor Lee, who gave her a drink claiming to be an herbal doctor.

events.title: FBI Intake Report Filed
events.description: A victim called the FBI National Threat Operations Center (NTOC) to report the historical rape by Jeffrey Epstein. The intake document was drafted.

keyFacts: A victim reported to the FBI in 2021 that she was raped by Jeffrey Epstein in 2001 or 2002 in New York City.

The victim described a specific modus operandi: Epstein allegedly waited for her in a building lobby, joined her in an elevator referencing seeing her on camera, and then forced his way into an apartment to assault her.
The victim alleges Epstein threatened to cut her throat during the assault.
The victim also reported a separate incident the following night where she believes she was drugged by a conference organizer named Victor Lee.
The document is an official FBI intake record, indicating the allegation was formally logged into the FBI's system under case number 50D-NY-3027571.
